mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.id as role_id, r.name, r.code, r.description FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
